sentences.en: ...the conventional notion of women as uncritical purchasers of heavily advertised products.
sentences.cn: ...妇女是对广告轰炸宣传的商品不批判的购买者这一传统观点。

sentences.en: He was an ardent, though not uncritical patriot.
sentences.cn: 他是一位强烈的爱国者, 虽然并非无懈可击.

sentences.en: He was uncritical of his son's conduct.
sentences.cn: 他对儿子的行为不加批判.

sentences.en: Her uncritical acceptance of everything I said began to irritate me.
sentences.cn: 我说什么她都不论对错一概接受，这倒惹我不耐烦起来。

sentences.en: News sources reflected uncritical estimates of the number of juvenile addicts.
sentences.cn: 新的数据来源反映了对青少年吸毒者数量无批判力的估计.

sentences.en: The opposite of critical thinking uncritical thinking, which is not thinking at all!
sentences.cn: 与批评性思考相反的便是不具批判性的思考, 也就是完全不思考!

sentences.en: The review is uncritical of the violence in the film.
sentences.cn: 这篇评论对影片宣扬暴力方面未作批判.

sentences.en: They offered a reasoned approach in place of the fanciful and uncritical accounts of the poets.
sentences.cn: 他们用合理化的解释来代替诗人的想象和不加分析的传说.

sentences.en: This became a favorite warning against the uncritical acceptance of received wisdom.
sentences.cn: 这对于全盘接受常理的人无疑是个良好的忠告.
这是一篇不加批评的文章.
盲目的相信一切害了我自己

words.tran_cn: 不加鉴别地；不加批评地

trans.tran_cn: 不加鉴别的，不采取批判态度的，无批判力的，批评不当的
trans.tran_en: unable or unwilling to see faults in something or someone – used to show disapproval
